item.title: Useful Help Commands - Apache Maven Tutorial â€“ CodeTab
item.description: Maven Help Command When we are struck with some aspect of Maven, Plugin’s Help goal and Maven Help Plugin comes handy to navigate output of the situation. Here we present some the useful Maven help commands as reference. Find Plugin Prefix In almost all Maven plugin related commands we need to use Plugin Prefix. We can find plugin prefixes in Maven Plugin Directory. The first column of the table contains the Plugin Prefixes.
